$comment: Twitch Application Configuration - Copy this to config.json and fill in your values

_comments.TWITCH_CLIENT_ID: Your Twitch application's Client ID from https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps
_comments.TWITCH_CLIENT_SECRET: Your Twitch application's Client Secret - KEEP THIS SECRET!
_comments.TWITCH_ACCESS_TOKEN: User Access Token generated by the broadcaster account. Run 'npm run oauth' to generate.
_comments.TWITCH_BROADCASTER_ID: The broadcaster's user ID (must match the token owner)
_comments.REDIRECT_URI: OAuth redirect URI (must match Twitch app settings)
setup_instructions: 2. Get Client ID and Secret from https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps
3. Run 'npm run oauth' to generate the access token
4. Fill in your broadcaster ID (shown during OAuth flow)
5. Save and start the application with 'npm start'
